webmakerAuthTakenError: That username is taken. Try adding your favourite number at the end.
webmakerAuthUsernameInvalid: Uh oh! All usernames must be between 1-20 characters, and only include "-" and alphanumeric symbols
webmakerAuthMailingList: Send me email updates about Mozilla Webmaker and other projects
webmakerAuthAgreeToTerms: I agree to Mozilla Webmaker's Terms and Privacy Policy
webmakerAuthAgreeError: Oh snap! You must agree to our terms and conditions.
NotAnEmail: Uh oh! That doesn't look like an email address.
WebmakerAccountExists: Heads up! That email already has an account. Did you mean to sign in?
resetMessage: Check your email for a password reset link.
resetRequestFailed: Uh oh! Something went wrong! Try requesting the password reset again.
password_reset_complete: Your password has been reset successfully! You can now try and log in.
otp_enabled: You have enabled one-time password logins for your account!
tokenMessage: Please check your email to confirm your account.
That does not look like an email address: Uh oh! That doesn't look like an email address or username.
No account found for your uid: We couldn't find your username or email address. Did you mean to create an account?
invalid email or password: The email and/or password your entered in invalid.
problem sending token: There was a problem sending a login key to you, please try again.
incorrectToken: Uh oh! That key is not correct.
Enter your key to login: Visit your email to retrieve your key
you can switch to webmaker login: Remember you can switch back to our Webmaker Login experience. We will send you email tokens, instead of having to remember passwords.
Enter the Login key: Enter the Login key we just sent you
Must have a lower case letter: Must have a lower case letter (a-z)
Must have an upper case letter: Must have an upper case letter (A-Z)
Must contain at least one digit or non w: Must contain at least one digit or non word character (1-9 or !@#$)
Must be at least 8 characters long: Must be at least 8 characters long
Must be at less that 120 characters: Must be at less that 120 characters
The passwords entered do not match!: The passwords entered do not match!
Password Set Successfully: Password Set Successfully! You will be required to provide it to log in from now on.
A reset request has been emailed: A reset request has been emailed to you, follow the instructions in it to reset your password.
Trouble with the key: Trouble with the key? Get help.
Your Password Reset Failed: Your Password Reset Failed! Try reloading the page or resending the reset request.
webmakerAuthServerError: An unknown error occured on the server. Try your request again, and if the problem persists, please contact us.
log in with Persona: or log in with Persona
aboutWebmaker: Make your own web pages, interactive videos, remixes and mobile apps.
AboutGoggles: X-Ray Goggles allow you to see the building blocks that make up websites on the Internet. Activate the goggles to inspect the code behind any webpage.
AboutThimble: Thimble makes it ridiculously simple to create and share your own web pages. Write and edit HTML and CSS right in your browser, then instantly preview your work.
AboutPopcornMaker: Popcorn Maker helps you easily remix web video, audio and images into cool mashups that you can embed on other websites. Popcorn Maker videos are dynamic, full of links and unique with every view.
AboutAppmaker: Appmaker is a free tool for creating personal mobile apps, even if you don't know how to code!
passwords do not match: Uh oh! The passwords do not match!
error setting password: Uh oh! There was an error trying to set your password, please try again.
Password Reset Success: Success! You've successfully reset your password, please sign in!
Password too weak: Uh oh! The password you've entered is too weak. Make sure it doesn't contain any common words or patterns, also make sure it meets the minimum requirements.
At least 1 upper and lower case characte: At least 1 uppercase and lowercase character
resetRequestFailed: Uh oh! There was a problem processing your request, please try again.
